unnormalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor Secretly a Poet?
normalised: Entertainment News: Is Ranbir Kapoor Secretly a Poet?

unnormalised: Buzz is building around Ranbir Kapoor after he was spotted at Prithvi Theatre at 11:00 PM on 24/03/2024 looking suspiciously like he was attending a hush-hush poetry slam! Witnesses say he was clutching a well-worn notebook and muttering something about "Dil Dosti Duniyadari." Could RK be secretly penning verses inspired by his family life and Alia's cooking?
normalised: Buzz is building around Ranbir Kapoor after he was spotted at Prithvi Theatre at eleven p.m. on twenty fourth March two thousand and twenty four looking suspiciously like he was attending a hush-hush poetry slam! Witnesses say he was clutching a well-worn notebook and muttering something about "Dil Dosti Duniyadari." Could R K be secretly penning verses inspired by his family life and Alia's cooking?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, rumours are swirling about a potential Bollywood hookup! Apparently, Janhvi Kapoor and Vijay Deverakonda were seen enjoying a quiet dinner at Bastian, Mumbai, last Tuesday, 19/03/2024. Sources close to Janhvi are denying any romantic involvement, claiming they were "just discussing a future project." Sure, Janhvi, sure!
normalised: Meanwhile, rumours are swirling about a potential Bollywood hookup! Apparently, Janhvi Kapoor and Vijay Deverakonda were seen enjoying a quiet dinner at Bastian, Mumbai, last Tuesday, nineteenth March two thousand and twenty four. unnormalised: And finally, get this: pictures surfaced online showing Ranveer Singh sporting a completely new, toned-down look on 15/08/2023. No neon, no OTT prints, just... khakis and a plain white kurta. Has Baba finally grown up? Or is this just method acting prep for his next role? Stay tuned, folks, because Bollywood never disappoints!
